content.prompt: Which of the following best states the narratorâ€™s central point about novelists?

choices.label: They are less talented than writers of nonfiction.
They present an unrealistic vision of ordinary life.
They place their own interests above those of readers.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
